byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Zahra Nader and Rod Nordland from Kabul, and by an employee of The New York Times in Afghanistan.
byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and JAWAD SUKHANYAR

headline.print_headline: Foreign Security Contractors Are Killed by Bomb in Kabul
headline.main: Bomb Kills Foreign Security Contractors in Kabul

snippet: At least 14 Nepalese and Indian guards were killed while riding in a minibus to work at the Canadian Embassy, police officials said.
lead_paragraph: At least 14 Nepalese and Indian guards were killed while riding in a minibus to work at the Canadian Embassy, police officials said.
